name: Rising Seas (sorskoot)
description:
The seas are being polluted.  The sea levels are rising. The ice is melting. Can you save the polar bears and penguins by keeping the water clean and stopping the ice from melting?

You can walk around with your left controller. You can move animals from a piece of drift ice to another using the right controller.

Please note :
- that the game can only be played using a VR headset and is only tested on Oculus Quest 1
- that the game is not completely finished. But it gives an impression of what I might look like in the future.
